group_1.textCenter: Which is why, I'll be relying on everyone again!

group_1.textRight: Of course!@Once I start, I'll not stop until it's done!

group_1.textLeft: Mmh...

group_1.textRight: But, what did you mean when you said@"experiences of success"...?

group_1.textLeft: For people who don't understand the joy of helping others,
to help those kinds of people change their minds,
small accomplishments are a must!@That's what I read from a book!
That's what an experience of success is!

group_1.textRight: And to achieve that, what are you going to...?
Ah, is it a mini Halloween Festa...?

group_1.textLeft: A mini Halloween Festa...!@[chara:111201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:111201:cheek_0][chara:111201:face_mtn_ex_040.exp3.json][chara:111201:lipSynch_1]... Sounds fun, but that's not it...

group_1.textRight: So you want Alina to help out someone and be appreciated...?

group_1.textLeft: Correct!@And I've already thought up a plan!
It's called...@Alina-senpai's Civilian Rescue Mission!

group_1.textRight: Civilian Rescue Mission...?

group_1.textLeft: As a Magical Girl, we have to save ordinary people@from Witches.
We have to have Alina-senpai be thanked for it!

group_1.textRight: I don't think I've ever been thanked for it...

group_1.textLeft: Mmm...@Well, it's not like we're doing it to be thanked...

group_1.textRight: Um... Well, in the preparations earlier,
I thanked Alina for helping me back then, but...
She didn't look too happy...

group_1.textLeft: T-That's because...
She must have not felt it because of her amnesia!
... Probably.

group_1.textRight: Ah, that's right... If she didn't remember, then...

group_1.textLeft: I'm confident that's it!

group_1.textRight: But there wouldn't just be anyone conveniently@being attacked by a Witch...

group_1.textLeft: And that's where Yura-senpai comes in!
I heard from Akari that, inside of Yura-senpai's@pillow,
there's an entire dream world inside!

group_1.textRight: ... You mean the world of pajama parties...

group_1.textLeft: This dream world will definitely give us more@freedom than reality!
Like preparing opponents and so on...
That's why...

group_1.narration: [flashEffect:flashWhite1][se:3201_heal]"[textRed:I want you]@[textRed:to lend me this dream world!]"

group_1.textRight: Eeh? That's a bit...
[chara:304801:effect_shake]...
I got it... I'll lend it to you...

group_1.textLeft: Thank you so much!

group_1.textRight: I'm gonna go get reeaady...@Please wait a minute...
How surprising...@To think Hotaru would cooperate so easily...

group_1.textLeft: Surprising...?

group_1.textRight: Normally, she'd be more of a pain than this...
I'm sure Karin's enthusiasm got through to her...!

group_1.textLeft: Ehehe...

group_1.textRight: I'm going to do my best, too!
I want everyone to know that Alina is a good person!
Moka is indebted to her, right?
... Eh?@Then, Karin,
why are you going through all this trouble for Alina?
Are you two good friends?

group_1.textLeft: I...@Don't think she sees me as a good friend...
But...

group_1.textRight: Alina-senpai!
I drew a new manga, please read it!

group_1.textLeft: ... Okay.

group_1.textRight: How is it?

group_1.textLeft: The composition is utter garbage.

group_1.textRight: Uu... Not again...

group_1.textLeft: A two-page panel spread is used to highlight something, right? So what did you want the reader@to focus on?

group_1.textRight: That scene is...

group_1.textLeft: Stop!
What's the point of drawing a manga if you@have to explain what's happening in it?
If you can't show what you should be showing,@you're better off just not drawing it.

group_1.textRight: Ah...
Thank you for your advice!

group_1.textLeft: Alina-senpai is strict and has a bad attitude, but...
She takes my manga so seriously!
She's a very reliable senpai!

group_1.textRight: Huh...@She doesn't sound like just a scary person...

group_1.textLeft: That's right...!
Alina is hard to understand, but she's very kind...!

group_1.textRight: I'm baaack...@Everything's readyy~...

group_1.textLeft: Welcome back.
... Um, I know it's a little late for this, but is@this okay?
You won't get into trouble again, will you...?

group_1.textRight: ... Nhh~... There's no choice except to do it...
Akari and Moka...@You two should also transform, at least...
